values.text: I can tell you about our store locations and opening hours, or help you set up an appointment.
You could also ask me to connect you to an agent.

values: Hello, I’m a demo customer care virtual assistant to show you the basics.  I can help with directions to my store, hours of operation and booking an in-store appointment

name: Customer Care Sample Skill
description: Sample simple customer service skill to get you started.
